Title: The best in the Range! Go for it...
Review:
Value for Money: 4.5/5
Performance: 5/5
Build quality :4.5/5
Design 4.5/5
Noise 4/5(only drier makes a little noise)


Brief:

This was my first purchase of a Fully Automatic Machine. Been using for a Semi-automatic machine for the past 20 years, we finally decided to shift to a fully automatic machine. Having heard really bad feedback about the top load we decided on the front load. I shortlisted about 3 Brands in the budget - Samsung, LG, Bosch. Heard some quality issues with Bosch in Indian retails washing machines so that was out of the list. Got it for 24K in the BBD sale after card discounts.

Delivery:

Decided to buy Samsung because of the trust in the brand after looking at it in an offline store (Though, I feel LG has very slight edge on build quality). I loved the design on Samsung a little bit better. Coming to delivery, it was delivered after 8 days which is fine considering the BBD rush. Installation was done the next day by Samsung guys.

Installation:

The installation was smooth, and the staff was considerate of any requests. He offered a stand for 1600 and Cover for 500. I felt the quality was nice so decided to go for it!
He explained all the features with great patience. Basically, you are going to use Daily wash mode 90% of the time. I installed the machine in my bathroom, and it is fine.

Operations:

You turn on the machine and tap and choose the mode. 2 caps of liquid detergent and turn on the machine. The daily wash mode takes 66 minutes and try to use only 800 rpm as I feel like 1400 is going to affect the clothes. You can also choose the temperature of the heater. You can also choose from options like soiled for extra dirty clothes and rinse for rinsing the clothes a little longer. All of these options increase the washing time but gets the job done.

Performance:

The washing is perfect, Maybe I haven't experienced front load before but definitely much better than semi-automatic machine. You can also use rinse+ dry option to just dry the wet clothes. The heater dries up the clothes well) (I use 40 degrees to be on the safer side.) The moisture content after drying is about 20-25% which is pretty okay for the price. I have been using it for about a month and I have tried all types of different clothes like Bedsheets, cotton, synthetic, polyester, wool etc. All the stains are well vanished.

At a single load you can fit up to 11-12 normal clothes.
2-3 bedsheets
1-2 ac quilts


Overall, a very value for money washing machine with ample of features. If you have a little more budget, then go for the Wifi connected one. It has more user-friendly operations.

Title: Decent product
Review: Delivery experience was horrible. Only one person has come for delivery. How can one person lift this 65kg item. Now customer has no choice other than to follow the delivery boy for lifting and placing it in my home. What kind of a delivery manner it is? What if only ladies at home? Does the Flipkart expect the same experience with women too? Flipkart must respond to this. Overall, good product with worst delivery experience.

Title: Great product
Review: Excelent Machine. I was using top load machine from last 12yrs and switched to front load. Must say, it is more efficient then the top load machine. it take less water, cleaning efficiency is excelent. The AI feature auto detects the kind of load in and does the wash. As this machine is WiFi enabled you can connect it with your phone and with the confort of the app you can select the wash mode you want. Out of many Features i would like to highlight few of then which is really helpful for every day use. 1.It has got on option of Bubble Wash(here the clothes will be socked in the soap solution for some time and then wash starts) 2. Temp up to 90 degrees. you have option to select temprature from 40 to 90 degress. 3. you can customize the rinz cycle(i.e how many rinz cycle you want). 4. It may sound gimic to have WiFi enabled machine but its really useful as it will give so much informaiton about your machine. to name a few(it will tell you how many wash remaining for durm clean, how much energy you have used and also tells how much money has it consumed. It also gives you option to customized your wash preferrence via the app, so you need not have to be infrot of the machien rotating the nob everytime).Over all after using a top load washing machine form last 12yrs and moving to this machine was a really very good dicision that i took. I tried to share my experience of the machine, hopefully it will help others to take decision.

Title: Value-for-money
Review: Amazing product and good quality

Title: Very Good
Review:
Pros-
Enough wash cycle options on panel and low noise operation
Touch panel to select functions is better than tactile buttons
Clothes are washed as expected depending on the cycle selected. Earlier i thought top load washes better but front load is better in my opinion now.
Few wash cycle sprays water jet on clothes to remove detergent during rinse

Cons-
9kg Drum size looks the same as my old 6.5 kg top load machine. Before purchasing online, visit some stores to check if the drum size is as per expectation or not. Buy 12kg version of possible.
It has a quick wash option but it is meant for a few clothes.
Electricity consumption is higher
Sometimes clothes are not that dry. My Whirlpool top load used to dry better which had 800 rpm speed. Samsung has 1400 speed.
Not easy to throw soiled clothes in this one like we do in top loads. I feel frequent open close of the front door may loosen the lock and rubber gasket over time. Let's see.
The convenience of filling water from an external pipe or bucket when the water supply is gone is not something you can do here. Not a con but just highlighting if someone faces an irregular water supply.

About product, first thing I've noticed that rat protection panel was of cardboard material, one can easily make this. Panel should be provided out of these plastic, steel or rubber.

Cycle stops thrice in between daily wash cycle on first day of usage which is not acceptable.

Overall I'm completely disappointed with flipkart services due to all this.

In return, flipkart is not being providing a plastic rat protection panel which should be given at the time of delivery or installation.

Title: Very poor
Review:
Genuine review:

Samsung 8.0 kg , the quality of drum is very poor. very light. Not so strong . When knock on the drum, the sound itself speaks of low quality. I had 7.5 kg MARQ front load washing machine. Very robust, drum strong, good build quality. Outer front body got rust with time. It ran 5 years. 2 times per day. 365 days for 5 years.

The door nut and bolt and its fixation with the machine body is of poor quality. If by mistake if you open the door with jolt/ by force, to its maximum opening, the door will unpluck and will come out in your hand. Feels like this.

If by mistake, you are walking and collides with the already open gate at opposite, the door will get unpluck easily and fall on floor. Very cheap quality material.

Buttons available are also not so smooth.

The door lock knob is also very cheap.

Overall, The materials used is of low/cheap quality to compensate with 20 years motor warranty. Adding new features+warranty+low in price/budget= balancing with cheap drum and materials.

Handle with care.
Will review after installation of product and washing the clothes .

One suggestion: Which ever product you want to buy on flipkart, first go in shop and check its drum quality and buttons etc. and decide and purchase.
I guess but not sure, the company makes two types of product 1. for shops. good quality and 2. for online sale. average quality.May be also online product is of low quality with low rate. Shop price is high, may be product quality is good.
I have purchased, so i will not return now.

By look the product looks very attractive. For first time user, they will love the product. Those who have already used other washing machine of good quality, and then purchase these products, they dont like it .

However, online provides middle classes people to buy at budgetary level.

Title: Classy product
Review:
Excellent machine best in front load 7-9 kg segment.
Pros:
There is no vibration in 1200 RPM spinning
Perfect wash quality
Superb build quality
Beautiful design
Low power and water consumption
No sound
Cons: ( won't say Cons but scope of improvements to make it perfect)
Water drain pipe could have been better

Overall value for money. Go for it without a second thought.
I bought it during the Diwali sale (26918)and got some good deals.
Actually, MRP is mentioned 49999, but in samsung official website, the actual cost of this product 29999. If it's higher than this anywhere, please check once in the manufacturer website.

Thanks, Flipkart, for providing such a wonderful service and always my trusted platform.
